variation.name: FootnoteFromOutOfScope
variation.description: 301.10 The instance contains two footnote links. The second one contains an arc with a from value that does not have a corresponding loc in the same extended link.

variation.name: FootnoteToOutOfScope
variation.description: 301.11 The instance contains two footnote links. The second one contains an arc with a to value that does not have a corresponding footnote resource in the same extended link.

variation.name: FootnoteLocOutOfScope
variation.description: 301.12 The instance contains a footnote link. In the footnote link there is a loc element that has an href that points to a fact in another instance document.

variation.name: FootnoteLocInScope
variation.description: 301.13 The instance contains a footnote link. In the footnote link there is a loc element that has an href that points to a fact in the instance document using the instance document file name with a fragment identifier.

variation.name: FootnoteFromResource
variation.description: 301.14 The instance contains a footnote link. The arc in the footnote link has a from value that matches a footnote resource. This is not valid for the fact-footnote arc role on the arc. The from must point to a loc which in turns points to a fact in the same instance document.

variation.name: FootnoteToLoc
variation.description: 301.15 The instance contains a footnote link. The arc in the footnote link has a from value that matches a footnote resource. This is not valid for the fact-footnote arc role on the arc. The from must point to a loc which in turns points to a fact in the same instance document.

variation.name: FootnoteWithoutLang
